column3: Latest;Ratanakkiri province:------ Two Laotian had a lucky escape after being struck by lightning at 4:10 pm on October 19
column5: at a forested spot in Bac Kai village
column6: Veun Sai district.------ The victims were  an 18-year-old and a 21-year old ethnic Laotian farmers. They were lucky to suffer only minor injuries and were taken to recover in hospital. ------KBN------UPDATE: A later reports says that one of the men died from his injuries.
